website_summaries.verdict: The best single impact driver Bosch has to offer. Entire kit is geared for professional use.
pros: Larger battery lasts twice as long as the slimmer options
Additional accessories like a belt hook make using the driver easier
cons: A premium price for a premium tool

customer_reviews.title: Dealer Tech Review
customer_reviews.text: Not for professional use. It is very comfortable to hold and it's lightweight and has a decent batter. But as for an impact gun it's pretty weak. If I sit on the trigger it can maybe break 80 ftlbs. Seems fine as a household drill, but no point of having a two n one if the other half isn't good. I wanted to love this impact, so did my bank account, but atlas I must stamp it no suitable for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Chuck part of it locks up constantly
customer_reviews.text: The chuck part of it where you place your different heads on it locks up constantly and makes it very hard to change them out. I literally have to put it in a vice to take the implements out. It’s very frustrating and a defect in the item.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! QUALITY with THOUGHTFUL Engineering
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So impressed with this guy! Light, super powerful with great control, and easy to manipulate due to its size/weight. Additionally, the versatility of purchasing other 18V Bosch products and using the batteries interchangeably is ridiculously convenient!! Being a new DIYer as hobby and graphic designer/photographer by profession, I was originally attracted to Bosch for their German engineering and their product’s overall aesthetic. I can now assure everyone QUALITY is definitely one of Bosch’s strongest attributes.
customer_reviews.author: Störung

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas for my Son
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these a few months before. Loved it and showed it to my son who also liked it. So being a good dad, I got him one for Christmas. He has already used it for many projects and he doesn't have to borrow mine. Keeps my tools where they belong. Drill has good feel, power, and is easy to charge. Can't beat a Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: DAH

customer_reviews.title: Nice little impact driver
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bosch power tools for several years and this one used my current tools battery and charger. Works as advertised. I have used to change tires on a camper trailer and ATV with no issues. Based on experience with those I would say this tool would struggle with a car or truck tire that had been over tightened or was corroded but other than that I would think it could get the job done. Is this a tool for someone who changes tires for a living? No, but for the average DIY around the house person this one works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and read well torque units are in-lbs
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed to find out the max torque is very low. But I’m scoring this low because the description is very misleading saying 1600 in-lbs when everybody else uses ft-lbs. When you search and you read torque what stands out is the number not the units. It’s a great little tool but not strong enough to remove wheel lug nuts from a pick up truck
customer_reviews.author: MARIO LEAL

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable grip. It's a decent light/ medium impact. Should bust a nut off a passenger car. Rated around 130 lbs. It is very smooth and it is my go to if i can't get to my other impact. Great for a dyi person but stick to the gen2 with the 4 and 21700 cells. Great to have the 1/4 driver and 1/2 inch option.
customer_reviews.author: Blanr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and feel (ergonomics) of these drills, especially the drill (perfect to handle) you want to buy the set because it comes with 2.0 batteries instead of 1.5 when drill is purchased separately. Amazon is offering these sets for what batteries and charger usually sell for alone.
customer_reviews.author: jack braddell

customer_reviews.title: Bosch, best cordless tools
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Bosch fan so I have a bunch of other 18v tools. Added this one to my repertoire. Bosch, most durable cordless tools I've ever owned and there have been many in my 35 + year career. Nice this one came with a case, charger and battery.
customer_reviews.author: Pool Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver with Great Utility
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the performance of the this impact driver. I really like that it has the ability to use 1/2 in sockets and well as the 1/4 inch drive. I also like the 3 different speed and torque setting. Brushless motor should be long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wirsz

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews and add to cart already!
customer_reviews.text: Cords. I’ve got so many great tools with cords. I’ve wanted an impact driver for a few years. But again, I already have great tools... with cords. Why did I wait??!!!! Not only am I replacing all my corded tools, I’m replacing my friends too. Why didn’t these guys tell me about the wonders of this amazing impact driver?! The battery lasts forever, it has amazing power, the 2-in-1 sockets is fantastic. The batteries charge quick, the grip and balance are great and I can’t live without built in LED lights anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: strong and well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is providing a hard case. The driver has lots of power. I recently replaced the security screens on the doors to the house. I drove 4" torx head screws for the new screens with ease. This unit was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: arcorabin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This small lightweight driver is awesome. A lot of power built in. easier to handle than my big old Dewalt, ancient but still working well. This Bosh takes off lug nuts with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: layed_back

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Even though this version of the "Freak" is not the latest, only output up to 1600 in/lbs, it still has enough torque to undo most of the bolt/screw/nut. For stubborn bolt/nut, I will use my Milwaukee 18V torque wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Ching-Ho Cheng

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power for stuck bolts
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Surprised how powerful it is. Don't like getting the handle greasy but it is a tool for working on the car. Wipes clean easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Author of Complete Access

customer_reviews.title: I got a great price on sale
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it much yet. If it performs and lasts like other Bosch tolls I have I will be very happy. In my opinion Bosch is the best, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: RD MN

customer_reviews.title: The dual quick connect 1/4 drive and 1/2 socket drive ...
customer_reviews.text: The dual quick connect 1/4 drive and 1/2 socket drive is genius. I took all four wheels off my new subaru (To clear gobs of mud out of rims after playing) then reinstalled all 4wheels on one battery. No breaker bar needed. Powerful little thing. Dont try that with a large pickup though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold bits well.
customer_reviews.text: Quarter inch drive part is too deap some bits won't lock in, and some don't stick out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Replaced original shocks on my 1991 ranger and this little guy took nuts off with ease. Was shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice, small and compact but not enough power to remove lugnuts set at 80ftlb. If you want something stronger, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: great tool. Only complaint would be the speed adjustment buttons display. The display is very hard to read in daylight - nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a Bosch
customer_reviews.text: Could only give for stars because it seems one battery will be faulty
customer_reviews.author: bopseek

customer_reviews.title: Nice impact driver
customer_reviews.text: Has plenty of power for my needs, the charger seems to charge the batteries quickly. Recommenced !!
customer_reviews.author: TimS

customer_reviews.title: The freak
customer_reviews.text: The 2amp batteries don’t have the punch to drive or really remove screws driven all the way in a 2x4 had to use my 12 volt Bosch to do the job. Up graded to 6 amp battery worked ok
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for home owners
customer_reviews.text: We don’t do any heavy activities in our house hold. This tool is perfect for our daily activities!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: it has lots of power, speed selection and it really feels good in your hand. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Inbal

customer_reviews.title: Not much power, can’t handle big projects!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a drill for light projects then this is the one for you. Not much power to push big projects. Had to just keep it for small things and have to purchase another for the big jobs. Waste of money if you ask me!!
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Great Bosch!
customer_reviews.text: I like the options like variable speed adjust, the dual purpose bit. Looking forward to the qualities like a long lasting battery.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: tighten very good and safe
customer_reviews.text: Works grate some truck wheels it removes and some u have to start with a log tool.tighten very good and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The best impact driver for the price range. Shoots out wheel studs in no time, closes them perfectly and doesnt brakes them.
customer_reviews.author: Anton F.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to air impact wrenches and was surprised at how powerful this Bosch is. Quarter-inch bits don't lock in which is a feature I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning

customer_reviews.title: Robust and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I've changed 8 wheels and 48 nuts on 2 SUVs within an hour without any problem. Also it was used as a motor for jack to lift and down mentioned above SUVs. One charged 2Amps battery is enough for it and more. Very nice tool :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Koshak

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Hell can't beat it for twice the price Just a damn good tool. Easy to control how much torque you are using for little stuff and then you can change your car tire. Has done everything I have asked for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Lots of power and small enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Lots of power and small enough to get into tight places and the lights are especially useful. Its a high quality tool and meant to last. I was initially nervous re: the price but I have bought cheaper tools in the past and had to replace them after they didn't hold up. I don't feel that will be the case for this Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Was rebuilding my deck and needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Was rebuilding my deck and needed a drill to remove over 200 screws. Then we installed a composite decking and inserted over 1000 screws. The drill held charge very well. It had the power to remove rusted and jammed screws during the deconstruction process. but it was smooth and easy to control during the rebuild. Awesome drill set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and great for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale for 99. It's been reliable and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: this little impact is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use the hell out of this impact. i bought it just for around the house working on stuff. but ended up using it for work to. i love it
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee is better unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It what I asked for. But I didn’t think of Milwaukee first. Should’ve.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A. Lowe

customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, arrived in good packaging. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Ran Shushan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love this product. Works great and you can select how much power it delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Renan M.

customer_reviews.title: ... worked autobody shop this tool my second power tool pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I worked autobody shop this tool my second power tool pretty good
customer_reviews.author: HYUN CHEOL  SIM

customer_reviews.title: Good power and ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: Good power and ergonomics. The tool is very comfortable to work with. I am a mechanic and use both the 1/4 inch chuck and 1/2 inch socket. To be able to change back and forth so easily is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my boyfriend no complaints he loves it makes his life easier
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Nabbie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool. First time that I have had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tool. First time that I have had a Impact style tool. Can run at very low speeds depending on how much you pull the trigger. Much lower speeds that other drivers that I have used. Some sockets may not fully lock in due to the length of the shank required. Be sure to check your bits. Requires 5/8" of clear shank to full lock in.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother, he says it works great. It’s light and compact, easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bosch IDH182-02 Cordless Impact Driver
customer_reviews.text: It useful for auto tire and also deck as well. Ergonomic is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Simon K

product_meta.title: Bosch IDH182-02 Cordless Impact Driver - 18-Volt Lithium Ion Brushless Tool Kit with (2) 2.0Ah Lithium Ion Batteries, Charger and Carrying Case
product_meta.description: Designed to answer tradesmen demands for versatility, power and control, The new Bosch IDH182 18 Volt Lithium Ion impact or brings to market an industry first with its socket ready adapter. This adapter allows users to seamlessly Change between 1/4 inch screwdriver bits and 1/2 inch sockets, thus removing the need for two tools or the hassle of broken socket adapters. Featuring innovative solutions such as the socket ready all in one tool holder, The IDH182 provides users with unmatched solutions to get the job done efficiently and effectively. The IDH182 is equipped with Bosch next generation EC Brushless motor, which provides 2x motor life, superior efficiency for longer runtime and absolutely no maintenance. This tool also features intelligent electronic cell and motor protection engineered to increase tool and battery life, Along with the borsch built hammer and anvil system that delivers maximum impact endurance and increased tool performance in wood and metal fastening applications. To complete tougher applications with maximum efficiency, The IDH182 delivers 1, 650 in Lbs. Of torque making if the most powerful impact driver in its class. Adjust tool speed and torque with a push of a button to maximize power or minimize fastener damage with the Bosch performance control system. The impact driver also features a compact head length of 6. 2 inch and weighs just 3. 2 pounds when paired with a 2. 0 Ah battery. In addition, the IDH182 is designed with the smallest grip diameter for best in class ergonomics and comfort and features the patented three LED design to provide maximum illumination of the work area without shadows. The IDH182 02 kit includes: (1) 18 Volt Brushless socket ready impact driver, (2) 2. 0Ah batteries, (1) charger, (1) double ended impact bit, (1) belt clip and (1) carrying case.
feature_bullets: Versatile: The Bosch IDH182 02 18V Brushless 1/4 inch And 1/2 inch socket ready impact driver allows users to enjoy flexibility on the job, with the socket ready adapter that has a 1/4 inch Hex and 1/2 inch Square drive in one tool

Efficient: The driver is powered by an EC Brushless motor that provides up to 2x the motor life, superior efficiency for longer driving runtime and no maintenance. Users can get more done, during the work day and over the life of the tool
Longevity: The Bosch electronic motor and cell protection helps prevent overheating and overloading for extended tool life and runtime

Variable speed: featuring the performance control system which allows users to select between 3 driving speeds and torque settings with the push of a button to maximize power or minimize fastener damage
Ergonomic: the Bosch IDH182 02 impact driver features the Smallest grip diameter for best in Class ergonomics and comfort making it the ideal tool for all day use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
